General.Name: Shandong Oriental Ocean Sci-Tech Co Ltd
General.Description: Shandong Oriental Ocean Sci-Tech Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the seawater seedling breeding, aquaculture, aquatic product processing, biotechnology, bonded warehousing, and logistics businesses in China and internationally. The company is involved in the breeding and cultivation of sea cucumbers, turbots, kelp seedling, and precious fish products. It also offers aquatic food deep processing products, such as frozen food, raw food, conditioning, cold-air drying, barbecue, flour-coated, and cooking products; prepared food series, frozen fish fillet series, sea cucumber series processed products, collagen series products; and other series. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Yantai, China. Shandong Oriental Ocean Sci-Tech Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Shandong Oriental Ocean Group Co., Ltd.

1.Name: Mr. Ji Yu  Tang
1.Title: Deputy GM, Pres of Marine Division & Non-Independent Director
